typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{@context} as string,
		{@type} as string,
		apiVersion as string,
		createdAt as timestamp,
		currentItemCount as short,
		currentLink as string,
		data as (observations as (elementId as string, exposureCategory as short, level as (levelType as string, unit as string, value as short), performanceCategory as string, qualityCode as short, timeOffset as string, timeResolution as string, timeSeriesId as boolean, unit as string, value as double)[], referenceTime as string, sourceId as string)[],
		itemsPerPage as short,
		license as string,
		offset as boolean,
		queryTime as double,
		totalItemCount as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments',
	wildcardPaths:['MET_MAXTEMP.json']) ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(data.observations, data.observations),
	mapColumn(
		Stasjon = data,
		Dato = data,
		{Maksimumstemperatur (dag)} = data
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 foldDown(unroll(Stasjon.observations, Stasjon.observations),
	mapColumn(
		Stasjon = Stasjon.sourceId,
		Dato = Stasjon.referenceTime,
		{Maksimumstemperatur (dag)} = Stasjon.observations.value
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten2
Flatten2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	store: 'sqlserver',
	schemaName: 'dbo',
	tableName: 'met_maxtemp',
	insertable: true,
	updateable: false,
	deletable: false,
	upsertable: false,
	recreate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	mapColumn(
		Stasjon,
		Dato,
		{Maksimumstemperatur (dag)}
	)) ~> sink1

		{@context} as string,
		{@type} as string,
		apiVersion as string,
		createdAt as timestamp,
		currentItemCount as short,
		currentLink as string,
		data as (observations as (elementId as string, exposureCategory as short, level as (levelType as string, unit as string, value as short), performanceCategory as string, qualityCode as short, timeOffset as string, timeResolution as string, timeSeriesId as boolean, unit as string, value as double)[], referenceTime as string, sourceId as string)[],
		itemsPerPage as short,
		license as string,
		offset as boolean,
		queryTime as double,
		totalItemCount as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments',
	wildcardPaths:['MET_MEANTEMP.json']) ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(data.observations, data.observations),
	mapColumn(
		Stasjon = data,
		Dato = data,
		{Middeltemperatur (dag)} = data
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 foldDown(unroll(Stasjon.observations, Stasjon.observations),
	mapColumn(
		Stasjon = Stasjon.sourceId,
		Dato = Stasjon.referenceTime,
		{Middeltemperatur (dag)} = Stasjon.observations.value
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten2
Flatten2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,

	schemaName: 'dbo',
	tableName: 'met_meantemp',
	insertable: true,
	updateable: false,
	deletable: false,
	upsertable: false,
	recreate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	mapColumn(
		Stasjon,
		Dato,
		{Middeltemperatur (dag)}
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		{@context} as string,
		{@type} as string,
		apiVersion as string,
		createdAt as timestamp,
		currentItemCount as short,
		currentLink as string,
		data as (observations as (elementId as string, exposureCategory as short, performanceCategory as string, qualityCode as short, timeOffset as string, timeResolution as string, timeSeriesId as boolean, unit as string, value as double)[], referenceTime as string, sourceId as string)[],
		itemsPerPage as short,
		license as string,
		offset as boolean,
		queryTime as double,
		totalItemCount as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments',
	wildcardPaths:['MET_NEDBOR.json']) ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(data.observations, data.observations),
	mapColumn(
		Stasjon = data,
		Dato = data,
		{Nedbør (dag)} = data
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 foldDown(unroll(Stasjon.observations, Stasjon.observations),
	mapColumn(
		Stasjon = Stasjon.sourceId,
		Dato = Stasjon.referenceTime,
		{Nedbør (dag)} = Stasjon.observations.value
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten2
Flatten2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	store: 'sqlserver',
	schemaName: 'dbo',
	tableName: 'met_nedbor',
	insertable: true,
	updateable: false,
	deletable: false,
	upsertable: false,
	recreate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	mapColumn(
		Stasjon,
		Dato,
		{Nedbør (dag)}
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		region as string,
		{år} as short,
		statistikkvariabel as string,
		{07832: Registrerte kjøretøy} as integer,
		{_c4} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['07832.csv']) ~> source1
source1 derive(Dato = toDate(concat('01/01/', toString({år})), 'dd/MM/yyyy'),
		statistikkvariabel = case(statistikkvariabel == "Personbiler", "Personbil",
statistikkvariabel == "Busser", "Buss",
statistikkvariabel == "Varebiler", "Varebil",
statistikkvariabel == "Lastebiler", "Lastebil",
statistikkvariabel == "Kombinerte biler", "Kombinert bil",
statistikkvariabel == "Traktorer", "Traktor",
statistikkvariabel == "Mopeder", "Moped",
statistikkvariabel == "Lette motorsykler", "Lett motorsykkel",
statistikkvariabel == "Tunge motorsykler", "Tung motorsykkel",
statistikkvariabel == "Beltemotorsykler", "Beltemotorsykkel",
statistikkvariabel == "Tilhengere", "Tilhenger",
statistikkvariabel == "Motorredskap", "Motorredskap"
),
		region = case(
    region == "0 Hele landet", "Norge",
    region == "K-4204 Kristiansand", "Kristiansand",
    region == "1001 Kristiansand (-2019)", "Kristiansand (-2019)",
    region == "1018 Søgne (-2019", "Søgne (-2019",
    region == "1017 Songdalen (1964-2019)", "Songdalen (-2019)"
)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		region as string,
		merke as string,
		{år} as short,
		statistikkvariabel as string,
		{07832: Registrerte kjøretøy} as boolean,
		{_c5} as string
	),
	format: 'table',
	store: 'sqlserver',
	schemaName: 'dbo',
	tableName: '07832',
	insertable: true,
	updateable: false,
	deletable: false,
	upsertable: false,
	recreate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	mapColumn(
		Region = region,
		{År} = {år},
		Biltype = statistikkvariabel,
		Antall = {07832: Registrerte kjøretøy},
		Dato
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		region as string,
		drivstofftype as string,
		{år} as short,
		statistikkvariabel as string,
		{07849: Registrerte kjøretøy} as integer,
		{_c5} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['07849.csv']) ~> source1
source1 derive(Dato = toDate(concat('01/01/', toString({år})), 'dd/MM/yyyy'),
		statistikkvariabel = case(statistikkvariabel == "Personbiler", "Personbil",
statistikkvariabel == "Ambulanser", "Ambulanse",
statistikkvariabel == "Busser", "Buss",
statistikkvariabel == "Varebiler", "Varebil",
statistikkvariabel == "Kombinerte biler", "Kombinert bil",
statistikkvariabel == "Lastebiler", "Lastebil",
statistikkvariabel == "Mopeder", "Moped",
statistikkvariabel == "Lette motorsykler", "Lett motorsykkel",
statistikkvariabel == "Tunge motorsykler", "Tung motorsykkel",
statistikkvariabel == "Beltemotorsykler", "Beltemotorsykkel",
statistikkvariabel == "Traktorer", "Traktor",
statistikkvariabel == "Motorredskaper", "Motorredskap"
),
		region = case(
    region == "0 Hele landet", "Norge",
    region == "4204 Kristiansand", "Kristiansand",
    region == "1001 Kristiansand (-2019)", "Kristiansand (-2019)",
    region == "1018 Søgne (-2019)", "Søgne (-2019)",
    region == "1017 Songdalen (1964-2019)", "Songdalen (-2019)"
),
		drivstofftype = replace(drivstofftype, "El.", "Elektrisitet")) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	store: 'sqlserver',
	schemaName: 'dbo',
	tableName: '07849',
	insertable: true,
	updateable: false,
	deletable: false,
	upsertable: false,
	recreate: true,
	mapColumn(
		{År} = {år},
		Biltype = statistikkvariabel,
		Sted = region,
		Drivstoff = drivstofftype,
		Bestand = {07849: Registrerte kjøretøy},
		Date = Dato
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		region as string,
		{type registrering} as string,
		drivstofftype as string,
		{år} as short,
		statistikkvariabel as string,
		{12906: Førstegangsregistrerte kjøretøy} as integer,
		{_c6} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['12906.csv']) ~> source1
source1 derive(Dato = toDate(concat('01/01/', toString({år})), 'dd/MM/yyyy'),
		statistikkvariabel = case(statistikkvariabel == "Personbiler", "Personbil",
statistikkvariabel == "Ambulanser", "Ambulanse",
statistikkvariabel == "Bobiler", "Bobil",
statistikkvariabel == "Busser", "Buss",
statistikkvariabel == "Varebiler", "Varebil",
statistikkvariabel == "Kombinerte biler", "Kombinert bil",
statistikkvariabel == "Lastebiler", "Lastebil",
statistikkvariabel == "Mopeder", "Moped",
statistikkvariabel == "Lette motorsykler", "Lett motorsykkel",
statistikkvariabel == "Tunge motorsykler", "Tung motorsykkel",
statistikkvariabel == "Beltemotorsykler", "Beltemotorsykkel",
statistikkvariabel == "Traktorer", "Traktor",
statistikkvariabel == "Motorredskaper", "Motorredskap"
),
		region = case(
    region == "0 Hele landet", "Norge",
    region == "4204 Kristiansand", "Kristiansand",
    region == "1001 Kristiansand (-2019)", "Kristiansand (-2019)",
    region == "1018 Søgne (-2019)", "Søgne (-2019)",
    region == "1017 Songdalen (1964-2019)", "Songdalen (-2019)"
)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	store: 'sqlserver',
	schemaName: 'dbo',
	tableName: '12906',
	insertable: true,
	updateable: false,
	deletable: false,
	upsertable: false,
	recreate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	mapColumn(
		Dato,
		Biltype = statistikkvariabel,
		Sted = region,
		Drivstoff = drivstofftype,
		{Solgte biler} = {12906: Førstegangsregistrerte kjøretøy},
		{År} = {år}
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		data as (trafficData as (volume as (average as (daily as (byYear as (total as (coverage as (percentage as double), volume as (average as short, confidenceInterval as (lowerBound as short, upperBound as short))), year as short)[])))))
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	wildcardPaths:['029d27ee-c578-4fce-897e-65ae895f0fae']) ~> source1
Flatten1 derive(each(match(true()), $$ = $$)) ~> DerivedColumn1
source1 foldDown(unroll(data.trafficData.volume.average.daily.byYear, data.trafficData.volume.average.daily.byYear),
	mapColumn(
		Year = data.trafficData.volume.average.daily.byYear.year,
		Percentage = data.trafficData.volume.average.daily.byYear.total.coverage.percentage,
		AverageVolume = data.trafficData.volume.average.daily.byYear.total.volume.average,
		LowerConfidence = data.trafficData.volume.average.daily.byYear.total.volume.confidenceInterval.lowerBound,
		UpperConfidence = data.trafficData.volume.average.daily.byYear.total.volume.confidenceInterval.upperBound
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	store: 'sqlserver',
	schemaName: 'dbo',
	tableName: 'AvgYearly',
	insertable: true,
	updateable: false,
	deletable: false,
	upsertable: false,
	recreate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	mapColumn(
		Year,
		Percentage,
		AverageVolume,
		LowerConfidence,
		UpperConfidence
	)) ~> sink1

activities.name: Copy data
activities.description:
Velg Source: SSB_HTTP
Velg Sink: SSB_BLOB_OUTPUT

Legg inn table ID på relativeUrl variabel under source
Legg api spørring fra SSB api console under body på source (husk å endre "json-stat2" -> "csv2" nederst i json spørring

Sjekk at mapping er tom. Hvis IKKE -> Trykk på "Clear" knappen

@activity('GetApiTitle').output.label som sink filename

activities.name: GetApiTitle
activities.description:
LEGG inn table ID fra SSB bakerst på url under settings
Legg samme json spørring som på copy data inn i body under settings. NB!!! Endre "csv2" til "json-stat2" her inne !IKKE i copy data!

activities.name: Copy data
activities.description:
Legg inn table ID på relativeUrl variabel udner source
Legg api spørring fra SSB api console under body på source (husk å endre "json-stat2" -> "csv2" nederst i json spørring

Sjekk at mapping er tom. Hvis IKKE -> Trykk på "Clear" knappen

activities.name: GetApiTitle
activities.description: LEGG inn table ID fra SSB bakerst på url under settings
